snippet: Janet Yellen -- a skilled economist and gifted communicator who likes to hike and cook -- made history on Monday as the U.S. Senate confirmed her to be the first woman to lead the Federal Reserve in its 100-year history....

headline.print_headline: Yellen Punches Through 'Glass Ceiling' at Fed
headline.main: Yellen Punches Through 'Glass Ceiling' at Fed

lead_paragraph: Janet Yellen -- a skilled economist and gifted communicator who likes to hike and cook -- made history on Monday as the U.S. Senate confirmed her to be the first woman to lead the Federal Reserve in its 100-year history.
